channel.title: propos on Considérations inactuelles
channel.description: Recent content in propos on Considérations inactuelles

item.title: Willful Ignorance
item.description: Sun Tzu said: know yourself, know your opponent, and not a single battle you will lose; know yourself, don't know your opponent, lose one, win one; know neither yourself nor your opponent, every battle you will lose. I can't help but feeling the full force of this quote as I, along with the rest of the world, watch incredulously as America flails helplessly while China is coasting along with an assurance not seen since Macartney met with the Qianlong Emperor in 1793.
